body: This story is also very good, but it should correct some points like characters that were created to be used in the dimensional creature experiment and didn't add anything, only specific characters that were used well, it could have been shown a little more of the blonde's situation and how she met the dimensional creature, disposable characters that were useless, corrected the situation of the attendant who faxed sex with the client that was not good and also the end of the high school girl that should have been different, because unfortunately it was bad , but the story is good even with some issues that could have been fixed.
remember don't do drugs and start drawings a manga/comic or this gonna happen
Still a Better Love Story than Twilight
